overview: Join Gorilla Monsoon for a look at some of the most bitter rivals going head-to-head in WWE. From Tito Santana challenging Greg "The Hammer" Valentine for the Intercontinental Championship in a Steel Cage Match to a vicious encounter between Bruno Sammartino and "Superstar" Billy Graham, don't miss this unique journey back in time.
tagline: The most highly anticipated matches of all time! And well worth the wait!
title: WWF Grudge Matches
